api_list.name: getPCServerMOTD
api_list.description: The MOTD of a PC server.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Used to provide the IP address & port of the server. Example: play.minesuperior.com

api_list.name: checkDomainDNS
api_list.description: Check the DNS of a domain

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain to check the DNS of.

api_list.name: checkIsUp
api_list.description: Check the status of a IP/Domain

required_parameters.name: endpoint
required_parameters.description: IP/Domain to check the status of.

api_list.name: getBlockedServers
api_list.description: List of servers blocked by Mojang
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://Minecraftstefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com/getBlockedServers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "Minecraftstefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getMinecraftServicesStatus
api_list.description: Check the current status of Minecraft's services
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://Minecraftstefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com/getMinecraftServicesStatus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "Minecraftstefan-skliarovV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getPlayerSkinFile

required_parameters.name: username

api_list.name: getPlayersAvatar
api_list.description: Return player avatar

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: Username of the player who you want an avatar of.

optional_parameters.name: helm
optional_parameters.description: Boolean for changing if the helm layer is rendered.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Number to change the size of the image.
